definition: to let blood (Chinese medicine)/to bleed/to stab sb (slang)
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: His extreme practices aroused the alarm and horror of European bloodletting physicians .
sentences.chinese: 他的極端行爲激起了歐洲放血醫師的警覺和恐慌。

sentences.english: A sharp skinning or boning knife is appropriate for this part of the operation.
sentences.chinese: 放血需要一把鋒利的去皮刀或剔骨刀。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of blood-letting therapy on acne vulgaris.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察針刺放血治療尋常痤瘡的療效。

sentences.english: In smaller operations, the pig is hoisted for bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 小型屠宰場中，生豬都是被吊起放血。

sentences.english: Their succor amounted to a blood-letting and a few cold compresses.
sentences.chinese: 他們的救助方法就是放血或用冷敷布降溫。

sentences.english: It seems keener on blood transfusions than on bloodletting.
sentences.chinese: 相比於給經濟放血，它看起來更熱衷於給它輸血。

sentences.english: Exsanguination , as long as my blood wasn't being used for something awful.
sentences.chinese: 因放血而死，只要我的血沒被用在邪門歪道上。

sentences.english: Before that bloodletting and leaches were used.
sentences.chinese: 在這之前採用的則是放血和水蛭療法。

sentences.english: But if Mars shall be in Capricorn, it makes a destroyer of men, and one that delights to shed blood.
sentences.chinese: 若火星位於魔羯，將危害人命且不利於放血者。

sentences.english: The pricking and rubbing methods is one of the collateral pricking bloodletting methods popular in the northwest Chinese folk.
sentences.chinese: 挑擦放寒方法爲西北普遍流行的民間刺絡放血法之一。

definition: to give or have an acupuncture treatment
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
suction cup (used in Chinese medicine to draw the blood and qi 氣|气)/detachable suction chimney to make a stove draw
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
draw out pus by applying a plaster to the affected area
to cure ills with poison (TCM)/to fight evil with evil/set a thief to catch a thief/to fight fire with fire
